pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Pose3D - Position and Orientation Python LibraryHandling 2D and 3D poses as well as transformations between reference frames.## DocumentationVisit page: <https://johnhal.gitlab.io/pose3d_python>## Installing LibraryThis ibrary is freely available at the Python Package Index. You can install the latest version onto your machine with the following command:``` bashpip install pose3d --upgrade```
